Demo - Consultants

This demonstration program shows QicsTable used in a program displaying a list of consultants. In the source, you will find examples of setting properties on cells, selection handling, as well loading and saving data from text files. You will also find uses of custom cell display objects, custom validators, and custom text formatters.

The code in this example can be found in <QICSDIR>/examples/consultant.

  • main.cpp Main Program Code
  • consultant.h Class Definitions
  • consultant.cpp Class Code
